DEFAULT.question: What are the documents required for getting my full KYC done?
DEFAULT.answerHtml:
You will need to upload the following

  • Photo of PAN card
  • Address proof (DL, Aadhaar, Voter's ID)
  • Photo of signature
  • Passport size photo
  • Short 5 sec video of you holding your PAN card.

Tap on 'Upload Docs' below.

DEFAULT.question: Do you charge for processing KYC?
DEFAULT.answerHtml: No. We do not charge anything for processing your KYC. We do it for free along with your first investment.

DEFAULT.question: How long will it take for my KYC to be done?
DEFAULT.answerHtml:
You are investment ready!

Your KYC will be processed within 1 working day after your first investment. 

Explore all mutual funds and stocks using the button below.

DEFAULT.question: I don't have a PAN card. Can I invest?
DEFAULT.answerHtml: You cannot invest without a PAN card as per SEBI rules. Please get your PAN card made to start investing.

DEFAULT.question: What is KYC? Why is it required?
DEFAULT.answerHtml: KYC stands for Know Your Customer. It is for the verification of your identity and address. KYC has been made mandatory by the Government of India.

DEFAULT.question: Is my KYC data safe? Will it be shared with anyone?
DEFAULT.answerHtml: Your KYC data is absolutely safe and secure with Groww. It will not be shared with anyone. Groww is registered with SEBI and AMFI and completely complies by all privacy rules.

DEFAULT.question: I am an NRI. Can I invest through Groww. My NRI KYC is verified.
DEFAULT.answerHtml: Sorry. We do not support NRI investments as of now.

DEFAULT.question: Is it necessary to do KYC for every investment?
DEFAULT.answerHtml: No. KYC is a one-time procedure. Once your KYC is done you do not need to do it again for any future investment.

DEFAULT.question: My issue is not listed here.
DEFAULT.answer: You can try searching for your issue. Alternatively you can raise a ticket with us. Our Customer Support champs will help you out in no time!
